All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Comment  
    CommentActivity
    Handle the collection of comments on QR codes (displaying, adding, etc.)
    CommentAdapter  
    Expanded_QR_View
    Expanded_QR_View Activity Open each QR code instance in a detailed view with all the information(hash,location,scanned by) This class also helps to see comments on the qr codes and delete the qr code.
    Home
    Home activity is the base activity which brings the user to it, when successfully logged in It has a leaderboard button which allows users to check the high score, low score, total scans, etc.
    LeaderboardActivity
    Displays the leaderboard with the option of sorting by the three main stats Does not rank users who are not on the board yet
    LeaderboardItem
    Used for creating the recycler view of the leaderboard
    Location
    Location Activity allows the user to check its current location, nearby QR codes and search for QR codes with a defined search The search functionality allows user to see nearby QR codes within a radius of 50KMs Each QR codes have their respective score values assigned to it, allowing user for an effective search
    LoginActivity
    LoginActivity Activity for logging the user into the app Will first check for stored credentials on device Presents user with option to create account or scan a QR code to login Upon successfully doing any of the above moves user to profile screen
    MainActivity
    Main activity
    OtherProfileActivity
    OtherProfileActivity Activity meant to display the info of another user Displays username and contact info to be started with an intent containing a User
    PersonalStats
    Displays a user's 4 main personal stats: highest/lowest score, total score, sum scans
    ProfileActivity
    ProfileActivity Activity meant to display user profile also allows setting profile contact info It has QR Code which can be generated to view game status
    QR_Scan
    QR Scan Activity is for scanning the QR code allows user to get the score and hash of the scanned QR code Record the image of the object/location Allows users to get the geo location as Latitude, Longitude and record it Through the navigation bar, the user can browse different activities such as, if on QR can activity, it can switch to home, profile etc.
    QRCode
    This class handles the creation of QR code objects
    QRCollectionActivity
    QRCollectionActivity Handles the user's collection of QR codes (displaying, deleting, adding, etc.)
    QRCollectionAdapter
    QRCollectionActivity This adapter class helps to display all the QR codes on a card view in QRCollections
    RVAdapter
    Adapater for recycler view of leaderboard
    RVAdapter.PlayerViewHolder  
    ScanLogin
    ScanLogin Activity allows to scan a QR code via login page, which loads its own profile on a different device with respective profile consisting of its stats, user info etc
    ScannedQR_GameStatus
    ScannedQR_GameStatus Activity allows user to scan social code of any other users profile and it helps them to see that users game status which includes, high score, total scans, etc
    ScanView
    Scan View Activity opens when scan button is pressed It allows the user to scan a QR code and get a textvalue of it
    ScoreActivity
    This class is used to update a user's stats.
    Search
    Search activity for searching users or qrcodes allows text entry then lists results
    User
    This class represents a users user Contains username, password, contactInfo
    UserAdapter
    UserAdapter Class to adapt User objects to a Listview
